spectratmo.output.global_tmean¶

Global time averages¶

class spectratmo.output.global_tmean.GlobalTMeanBase(dataset)[source]¶

Bases: spectratmo.output.BaseOutput

Handle the basic quantities obtained by global and time averaging.

class spectratmo.output.global_tmean.GlobalTMeanWithBeta(dataset)[source]¶

Bases: spectratmo.output.global_tmean.GlobalTMeanBase

Handle the basic quantities obtained by global and time averaging.

  • Time-average surface pressure \(\bar{p_s}(x_h)\)

  • smoothed function \(\beta(p, x_h)\)

    \[\beta(p, x_h) = smooth(H(\bar{p_s}(x_h) - p))\]

  • horizontal mean of \(\beta(p, x_h)\)

    \[\beta(p) = \langle \beta(p, x_h) \rangle\]

  • representative horizontal mean \(\langle \theta(p, x_h) \rangle_r (p) = \langle \beta \theta \rangle/\langle\beta\rangle\)

  • function \(\gamma(p)\) used in the computation of the APE:

    \[\gamma(p) = \frac{R}{- \Gamma(p) p \partial_p \langle\theta\rangle_r}\]

  • maybe also the ratio

    \[\frac{\partial_p \gamma}{\gamma}\]
compute_tmean_ps()[source]¶

Compute the time average of the surface pressure.

compute_beta()[source]¶

Compute beta from the time-averaged surface pressure.

Notes

\[\beta(p, x_h) = H(\bar{p_s}(x_h) - p)\]
compute_gamma()[source]¶

Compute the mean temperature and gamma.

Notes

\[\gamma(p) = \frac{R}{- \Gamma(p) p \partial_p \langle \theta \rangle_r}\]
class spectratmo.output.global_tmean.GlobalTMeanWithoutBeta(dataset)[source]¶

Bases: spectratmo.output.global_tmean.GlobalTMeanBase

Handle the basic quantities obtained by global and time averaging.

  • representative horizontal mean \(\langle \theta(p, x_h) \rangle_r (p) = \langle \theta \rangle\)

  • function \(\gamma(p)\) used in the computation of the APE:

    \[\gamma(p) = \frac{R}{- \Gamma(p) p \partial_p \langle\theta\rangle_r}\]

  • maybe also the ratio

    \[\frac{\partial_p \gamma}{\gamma}\]
compute_gamma()[source]¶

Compute the mean temperature and gamma.

Notes

\[\gamma(p) = \frac{R}{- \Gamma(p) p \partial_p \langle \theta \rangle}\]
